node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `node` ( `node_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type_nodetype` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` char(240) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `author_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `hits` int DEFAULT '0', `reputation` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `totalvotes` int DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`), KEY `title` (`title`,`type_nodetype`), KEY `author` (`author_user`), KEY `type` (`type_nodetype`), KEY `createtime` (`createtime`), KEY `authortype` (`type_nodetype`,`author_user`), KEY `reputation_totalvotes` (`reputation`,`totalvotes`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: node
